price: Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀ wọ́n pe òdodo (al-Ƙur’ān) ní irọ́ nígbà tí ó dé bá wọn. Nítorí náà, wọ́n ti wà nínú ìdààmú.
arabic: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِيٓ أَمۡرٖ مَّرِيجٍ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: bal kadhabū bil-ḥaqi lammā jāahum fahum fī amrin marījin
